creator: Mint Financial Technology Services LTD
descriptionHtml:
MyMintApp is a self-service platform developed for customers to carry out a range of digital and mobile banking transactions on their accounts. It offers customers benefits such as convenience, Speed, online real-time access, the security of transactions consummated and options to initiate basic service requests without having to physically visit the bank.

We offer different Banking Services such as SME Banking, Personal Banking, Corporate Banking, Internet Banking (Electronic Banking), Current Account Opening, Savings Account Opening, Business Services, Loans, e-Business Solutions, Personalized Money Tracking and Card Solutions, etc.

Mint Features:
✓ Fund Account — Make seamless instant payments into your account via Paystack, or send direct from your existing bank account.

✓ Saving Goals — Create up to 5 saving goals for different purposes - rent, car, family, holiday, business, etc. Fund your goals with any amount you like, and as often as you like - daily, weekly, monthly. Earn competitive interest rates on different tiers, depending on how much you save.

✓ Instant Transfers – Send instant payments to any account in Nigeria.

✓ Money Manager – Tag your expenses according to the most common categories, and see real views of how and where you spend monthly.

✓ Pay Bills – You can pay for most common bill categories, and enjoy zero transaction fees on most billers.

✓ Email, Push, and SMS notifications keep you aware of all account activity, in real-time.

✓ Have full control of your account limits, spending limits, daily limits, and more inside your app directly.

Security:
- Your money is protected by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC)
- Your data is secured according to Nigerian data protection requirements.
- Your transactions come with 3D-Secure for additional authentication, and fraud protection using Mastercard SecureCode.

Have questions? Visit www.bankwithmint.com to check out our FAQs

Ready to get started? Download the Mint app and start banking today.

When you download Mint, we will ask you to upload your ID and other information in order to verify your identity, creditworthiness, and provide you with an account quickly and easily. We take privacy very seriously and your personal information will never be shared without your direct permission.

container.value: Plot 952 Idejo Street, Vctoria Island, Lagos.

creator: Mint Financial Technology Services LTD
descriptionHtml:
MyMintApp is a self-service platform developed for customers to carry out a range of digital and mobile banking transactions on their accounts. It offers customers benefits such as convenience, Speed, online real-time access, the security of transactions consummated and options to initiate basic service requests without having to physically visit the bank.

We offer different Banking Services such as SME Banking, Personal Banking, Corporate Banking, Internet Banking (Electronic Banking), Current Account Opening, Savings Account Opening, Business Services, Loans, e-Business Solutions, Personalized Money Tracking and Card Solutions, etc.

Mint Features:
✓ Fund Account — Make seamless instant payments into your account via Paystack, or send direct from your existing bank account.

✓ Saving Goals — Create up to 5 saving goals for different purposes - rent, car, family, holiday, business, etc. Fund your goals with any amount you like, and as often as you like - daily, weekly, monthly. Earn competitive interest rates on different tiers, depending on how much you save.

✓ Instant Transfers – Send instant payments to any account in Nigeria.

✓ Money Manager – Tag your expenses according to the most common categories, and see real views of how and where you spend monthly.

✓ Pay Bills – You can pay for most common bill categories, and enjoy zero transaction fees on most billers.

✓ Email, Push, and SMS notifications keep you aware of all account activity, in real-time.

✓ Have full control of your account limits, spending limits, daily limits, and more inside your app directly.

Security:
- Your money is protected by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC)
- Your data is secured according to Nigerian data protection requirements.
- Your transactions come with 3D-Secure for additional authentication, and fraud protection using Mastercard SecureCode.

Have questions? Visit www.bankwithmint.com to check out our FAQs

Ready to get started? Download the Mint app and start banking today.

Privacy and permissions:
When you download Mint, we will ask you to upload your ID and other information in order to verify your identity, creditworthiness, and provide you with an account quickly and easily. We take privacy very seriously and your personal information will never be shared without your direct permission.

Mintyn for Business : Manage your business easily with Mintyn for Business. Get more from your business account with useful tools that give you absolute power over your finances.
Virtual Dollar Card: Transact anywhere online with your Virtual Dollar card at very low rates.
Bug Fixes: Enjoy a more reliable experience on the app due to major bug fixes and improvements.

title: Mintyn - Digital Banking App

container.value: Plot 952 Idejo Street, Vctoria Island, Lagos.

creator: Mint Financial Technology Services LTD
descriptionHtml:
Mintyn is a self-service platform developed for customers to carry out a range of digital and mobile banking transactions on their accounts. It offers customers benefits such as convenience, Speed, online real-time access, the security of transactions consummated and options to initiate basic service requests without having to physically visit the bank.

We offer different Banking Services such as SME Banking, Personal Banking, Corporate Banking, Internet Banking (Electronic Banking), Current Account Opening, Savings Account Opening, Business Services, Loans, e-Business Solutions, Personalized Money Tracking and Card Solutions, etc.

Mintyn Features:
✓ Fund Account — Make seamless instant payments into your account via Paystack, or send direct from your existing bank account.

✓ Saving Goals — Create up to 5 saving goals for different purposes - rent, car, family, holiday, business, etc. Fund your goals with any amount you like, and as often as you like - daily, weekly, monthly. Earn competitive interest rates on different tiers, depending on how much you save.

✓ Instant Transfers – Send instant payments to any account in Nigeria.

✓ Money Manager – Tag your expenses according to the most common categories, and see real views of how and where you spend monthly.

✓ Pay Bills – You can pay for most common bill categories, and enjoy zero transaction fees on most billers.

✓ Email, Push, and SMS notifications keep you aware of all account activity, in real-time.

✓ Have full control of your account limits, spending limits, daily limits, and more inside your app directly.

Security:
- Your money is protected by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC)
- Your data is secured according to Nigerian data protection requirements.
- Your transactions come with 3D-Secure for additional authentication, and fraud protection using Mastercard SecureCode.

Have questions? Visit www.bankwithmint.com to check out our FAQs

Ready to get started? Download the Mintyn app and start banking today.

Privacy and permissions:
When you download Mint, we will ask you to upload your ID and other information in order to verify your identity, creditworthiness, and provide you with an account quickly and easily. We take privacy very seriously and your personal information will never be shared without your direct permission.
descriptionShort: Don’t just own a Bank Account. Own your MINTYN. Your Bank. Your Rules.

title: Mintyn - Digital Banking App

container.value: Plot 952 Idejo Street, Vctoria Island, Lagos.

creator: Mint Financial Technology Services LTD
descriptionHtml:
Mintyn is a self-service platform developed for customers to carry out a range of digital and mobile banking transactions on their accounts. It offers customers benefits such as convenience, Speed, online real-time access, the security of transactions consummated and options to initiate basic service requests without having to physically visit the bank.

We offer different Banking Services such as SME Banking, Personal Banking, Corporate Banking, Internet Banking (Electronic Banking), Current Account Opening, Savings Account Opening, Business Services, Loans, e-Business Solutions, Personalized Money Tracking and Card Solutions, etc.

Mintyn Features:
✓ Fund Account — Make seamless instant payments into your account via Paystack, or send direct from your existing bank account.

✓ Saving Goals — Create up to 5 saving goals for different purposes - rent, car, family, holiday, business, etc. Fund your goals with any amount you like, and as often as you like - daily, weekly, monthly. Earn competitive interest rates on different tiers, depending on how much you save.

✓ Instant Transfers – Send instant payments to any account in Nigeria.

✓ Money Manager – Tag your expenses according to the most common categories, and see real views of how and where you spend monthly.

✓ Pay Bills – You can pay for most common bill categories, and enjoy zero transaction fees on most billers.

✓ Email, Push, and SMS notifications keep you aware of all account activity, in real-time.

✓ Have full control of your account limits, spending limits, daily limits, and more inside your app directly.

Security:
- Your money is protected by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC)
- Your data is secured according to Nigerian data protection requirements.
- Your transactions come with 3D-Secure for additional authentication, and fraud protection using Mastercard SecureCode.

Have questions? Visit www.bankwithmint.com to check out our FAQs

container.value: Plot 952 Idejo Street, Vctoria Island, Lagos.

creator: Mint Financial Technology Services LTD
descriptionHtml:
Mintyn is a self-service platform developed for customers to carry out a range of digital and mobile banking transactions on their accounts. It offers customers benefits such as convenience, Speed, online real-time access, the security of transactions consummated and options to initiate basic service requests without having to physically visit the bank.

We offer different Banking Services such as SME Banking, Personal Banking, Corporate Banking, Internet Banking (Electronic Banking), Current Account Opening, Savings Account Opening, Business Services, Loans, e-Business Solutions, Personalized Money Tracking and Card Solutions, etc.

Mintyn Features:
✓ Fund Account — Make seamless instant payments into your account via Paystack, or send direct from your existing bank account.

✓ Saving Goals — Create up to 5 saving goals for different purposes - rent, car, family, holiday, business, etc. Fund your goals with any amount you like, and as often as you like - daily, weekly, monthly. Earn competitive interest rates on different tiers, depending on how much you save.

✓ Instant Transfers – Send instant payments to any account in Nigeria.

✓ Money Manager – Tag your expenses according to the most common categories, and see real views of how and where you spend monthly.

✓ Pay Bills – You can pay for most common bill categories, and enjoy zero transaction fees on most billers.

✓ Email, Push, and SMS notifications keep you aware of all account activity, in real-time.

✓ Have full control of your account limits, spending limits, daily limits, and more inside your app directly.

Security:
- Your money is protected by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC)
- Your data is secured according to Nigerian data protection requirements.
- Your transactions come with 3D-Secure for additional authentication, and fraud protection using Mastercard SecureCode.

Have questions? Visit www.bankwithmint.com to check out our FAQs

Ready to get started? Download the Mintyn app and start banking today.

Privacy and permissions:
When you download Mint, we will ask you to upload your ID and other information in order to verify your identity, creditworthiness, and provide you with an account quickly and easily. We take privacy very seriously and your personal information will never be shared without your direct permission.
descriptionShort: Don’t just own a Bank Account. Own your MINTYN. Your Bank. Your Rules.

We offer different Banking Services such as SME Banking, Personal Banking, Corporate Banking, Internet Banking (Electronic Banking), Current Account Opening, Savings Account Opening, Business Services, Loans, e-Business Solutions, Personalized Money Tracking and Card Solutions, etc.

Mintyn Features:
✓ Fund Account — Make seamless instant payments into your account via Paystack, or send direct from your existing bank account.

✓ Saving Goals — Create up to 5 saving goals for different purposes - rent, car, family, holiday, business, etc. Fund your goals with any amount you like, and as often as you like - daily, weekly, monthly. Earn competitive interest rates on different tiers, depending on how much you save.

✓ Instant Transfers – Send instant payments to any account in Nigeria.

✓ Money Manager – Tag your expenses according to the most common categories, and see real views of how and where you spend monthly.

✓ Pay Bills – You can pay for most common bill categories, and enjoy zero transaction fees on most billers.

✓ Email, Push, and SMS notifications keep you aware of all account activity, in real-time.

✓ Have full control of your account limits, spending limits, daily limits, and more inside your app directly.

Security:
- Your money is protected by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC)
- Your data is secured according to Nigerian data protection requirements.
- Your transactions come with 3D-Secure for additional authentication, and fraud protection using Mastercard SecureCode.

Have questions? Visit www.bankwithmint.com to check out our FAQs

Ready to get started? Download the Mintyn app and start banking today.

Privacy and permissions:
When you download Mint, we will ask you to upload your ID and other information in order to verify your identity, creditworthiness, and provide you with an account quickly and easily. We take privacy very seriously and your personal information will never be shared without your direct permission.

creator: Mint Financial Technology Services LTD
descriptionHtml:
Mintyn is a self-service platform developed for customers to carry out a range of digital and mobile banking transactions on their accounts. It offers customers benefits such as convenience, Speed, online real-time access, the security of transactions consummated and options to initiate basic service requests without having to physically visit the bank.

We offer different Banking Services such as SME Banking, Personal Banking, Corporate Banking, Internet Banking (Electronic Banking), Current Account Opening, Savings Account Opening, Business Services, Loans, e-Business Solutions, Personalized Money Tracking and Card Solutions, etc.

Mintyn Features:
✓ Fund Account — Make seamless instant payments into your account via Paystack, or send direct from your existing bank account.

✓ Saving Goals — Create up to 5 saving goals for different purposes - rent, car, family, holiday, business, etc. Fund your goals with any amount you like, and as often as you like - daily, weekly, monthly. Earn competitive interest rates on different tiers, depending on how much you save.

✓ Instant Transfers – Send instant payments to any account in Nigeria.

✓ Money Manager – Tag your expenses according to the most common categories, and see real views of how and where you spend monthly.

✓ Pay Bills – You can pay for most common bill categories, and enjoy zero transaction fees on most billers.

✓ Email, Push, and SMS notifications keep you aware of all account activity, in real-time.

✓ Have full control of your account limits, spending limits, daily limits, and more inside your app directly.

Security:
- Your money is protected by the Nigeria Deposit Insurance Corporation (NDIC)
- Your data is secured according to Nigerian data protection requirements.
- Your transactions come with 3D-Secure for additional authentication, and fraud protection using Mastercard SecureCode.

Have questions? Visit www.bankwithmint.com to check out our FAQs

Ready to get started? Download the Mintyn app and start banking today.

Privacy and permissions:
When you download Mint, we will ask you to upload your ID and other information in order to verify your identity, creditworthiness, and provide you with an account quickly and easily. We take privacy very seriously and your personal information will never be shared without your direct permission.
descriptionShort: Don’t just own a Bank Account. Own your MINTYN. Your Bank. Your Rules.

appDetails.developerAddress: Plot 952 Idejo Street, Vctoria Island, Lagos.
appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Welcome to Mintyn Bank!

We've updated our data collection process to enhance your experience:

Tailored Services: Specify your app usage objectives to receive personalized services.

Improved Customer Understanding: Share insights about your customers to refine our offerings.

Optimized Sales Support: Detail your sales strategies to help us create features that boost your sales.

We comply with NDPR guidelines, ensuring secure and lawful data handling.

Press update now.
